**Introduction**<br>
We are a new hosting company and we are proud to offer your our start-up offers.
You can check out our features and read more about us at http://vxion.net .

**Our ( alpha- ) hardware in Dallas, Texas ( Infomart DC )** :

- Dual Intel Xeon L5639
- 72GB ECC RAM
- 4TB HDD

**Our start-up KVM offers :**


**ADKVM512 ( ALPHA DALLAS ) :**

- 512MB RAM
- 2 Cores  
- 25GB HDD
- 4TB Bandwidth
- 100Mbps Link Speed
- 1x IPv4
- $4.00/month -> $2.00/month with coupon  
- [Click Here](https://my.vxion.net/cart.php?gid=1)

**ADKVM1024 ( ALPHA DALLAS ) :**

- 1024MB RAM
- 3 Cores  
- 50GB HDD
- 4TB Bandwidth
- 100Mbps Link Speed
- 1x IPv4
- $6.00/month  -> $3.00/month with coupon   
- Open a ticket and you will get a free additional IPv4
- [Click Here](https://my.vxion.net/cart.php?gid=1)  
  
Coupon : **14STARTUP50**       
Type : Recurring Discount   
    

You need a VPS for a open source project ? No problem, open a ticket and send us the details, we will give you a free VPS for one month ( or more ) !
Or you need a special plan ? Also no problem, open a ticket and we will look what we can do !
